message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable.  Given its potential worth, I'm initially suggesting a price of $1,150,000. I'm confident this is a fair starting point for discussions.

Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your confidence in its value. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $950,000 to $1,000,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your budget constraints, the value of this product is truly significant and I can't let it go for less than $1,100,000.  I'm confident it will more than exceed your expectations at this price.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I've reviewed your latest offer and while I respect the value you place on the product, I must stick to my budgetary limits. I am willing to consider an offer of $1,000,000 for the product. I hope this aligns more closely with your expectations.
